publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2752 Irene Oldfather: European Committee 9th Report, 2001: Report on the Governance of the European Union and the Future of Europe: What Role for Scotland?—That the Parliament notes the 9th Report, 2001 of the European Committee, Report on the Governance of the European Union and the Future of Europe: What Role for Scotland? (SP Paper 466) and commends the recommendations to the Scottish Executive.

S1M-2752 Irene Oldfather: European Committee 9th Report, 2001: Report on the Governance of the European Union and the Future of Europe: What Role for Scotland?—That the Parliament notes the 9th Report, 2001 of the European Committee, Report on the Governance of the European Union and the Future of Europe: What Role for Scotland? (SP Paper 466) and commends the recommendations to the Scottish Executive.
